Name: Landmarks, Linden Gardens – UDAAP, Brooklyn (G 230037 NUK)
Title: Application number G 230037 NUK (Linden Gardens – UDAAP) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law for approval of an Urban Development Action Area Project (UDAAP) for property located at Blake Avenue (Block 4072, Lots 25 and 27), Essex Street (Block 4083, Lot 146), Jerome Street (Block 4078, Lot 11), Barbey Street (Block 4076, Lot 25), Livonia Avenue (Block 4074, Lot 39), Van Siclen Avenue (Block 4009, Lot 47; Block 4010, Lot 6), and Warwick Street (Block 4030, Lots 19 and 20), Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 5, Council Districts 37 and 42.
